entry.title: On OP_RETURN in upcoming 0.9
entry.summary: According to Tamas Blummer, it currently costs 5430 satoshis to create an output. A user named Wladimir responded that if transactions like this are not abused and more space is needed, the limit can always be increased in a future version. It is unclear whether the same spam limit applies if the script is OP_RETURN, but the original poster expressed concern about opening up the possibility for cheap spam.
